name: sleekly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of hair) in a way that is smooth, soft, and shiny: She combed out her hair until it glowed sleekly. Irene looked less sleekly groomed than usual.
in a way that is modern and fashionable, especially when this is simple and clean: The play is set in the couple's sleekly modern flat. Sleekly dressed waitresses brought me perfectly cooked lamb with roast peppers. See
sleek
More examplesFewer examples a sleekly beautiful racehorseThe rooms are sleekly contemporary, with ultra-modern lighting. The film feels sleekly new while actually containing little that you haven't seen before.
